response.original_title: The Castillos' Story HERA Housing and Economic Rights Advocates
response.overview: Housing and Economic Rights Advocates (HERA) is a California statewide, not-for-profit legal service and advocacy organization. HERAâ€™s mission is to ensure that all people are protected from discrimination and economic abuses, especially in the realm of housing. HERA focuses particularly on the needs of those who are most vulnerable, which includes lower-income people, the elderly, immigrants, people of color and people with disabilities.
response.title: The Castillos' Story HERA Housing and Economic Rights Advocates
